title: Mobile Application Developer (Erasmus+ Intern)
description: Ensured high performance and cross-device compatibility, optimizing app responsiveness and smooth operation across various Android devices
Implemented essential features such as user authentication, data storage with SQLite, and a dynamic user interface, which improved the overall user experience and functionality of the app

Developed and deployed Android mobile applications using Java and Android Studio, following object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to create scalable and maintainable code.
Designed a tourist places app with an integrated interactive map and API functionality, allowing users to explore nearby tourist destinations with detailed information

title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Contributed to an Agile development environment, participating in regular sprints, stand-ups, and code reviews, fostering continuous improvement and ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software
Enhanced project efficiency by adhering to best practices in version control using Git, facilitating smooth collaboration within the development team

Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and QA specialists, to design and implement RESTful APIs and user interfaces, ensuring seamless integration across multiple services and platforms

Spearheaded the development and maintenance of both front-end and back-end features, leveraging JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and React to build dynamic, responsive applications that improved user experience and system performance

title: Graphic Designer Intern
description: Created vector graphics using Adobe Illustrator
Gained knowledge in print production and publishing processes

Collaborated effectively within a design team on various creative projects
Developed an understanding of color management and layout for print
Assisted in preparing designs for both digital and physical formats
